channel.title: Porn Bots
channel.description:
So im verifying my smtp server and i logg onto my yahoo email i created like 8+ years ago... I get an IM from a random person: Heres what happend.
[code] Oct 09 9:22 PM robinolney56131:hi hottie! Oct 09 9:22 PM Eric B.:uhh Oct 09 9:23 PM robinolney56131: heya Oct 09 9:23 PM Eric B.: who are you? Oct 09 9:23 PM robinolney56131:whats up, I found your username on a yahoo member directory of social sites..not sure which one cause it bundles them all together lol Oct 09 9:23 PM Eric B.:ok...? Oct 09 9:23 PM robinolney56131:im not desperate hehe i just enjoy talking to ppl online especially via webcam Oct 09 9:24 PM Eric B.:are like a fuckin porn bot or something.. -.-" get a life. Oct 09 9:24 PM robinolney56131:uggh no i'm not are u???? lolz Oct 09 9:24 PM Eric B.:yeah totally. Oct 09 9:24 PM robinolney56131:are you signed up to any dating sites? i met a lot of cool people on adult friend finder, and only weirdos on fling lol Oct 09 9:24 PM Eric B.:im 16. Oct 09 9:24 PM robinolney56131:ya well, i am bored at home...and this usually leads to bad things anytime i take a break from school work i jump online Oct 09 9:24 PM Eric B.:okay awesome im 16, im not signing up for any site, and you should get a life. Oct 09 9:25 PM robinolney56131:Accept the invite, if you need the link again its http://caminvite.tumblr.com/Jenny Oct 09 9:25 PM Eric B.:your pathetic. Oct 09 9:25 PM robinolney56131:well...i am a true "autagonistophiliac" which means I have a fetish for being on camera you can google it if you dont believe me! lol Oct 09 9:25 PM Eric B.:okay awesome? Oct 09 9:25 PM robinolney56131:have you ever used FlushCam? its a yahoo adult site that allows us to chat, and even go live like skype Oct 09 9:25 PM Eric B.:yupp, as i figured some fucked up porn site. Oct 09 9:25 PM robinolney56131:Accept the invite, if you need the link again its http://caminvite.tumblr.com/Jenny Oct 09 9:26 PM Eric B.:fuck you. Oct 09 9:26 PM robinolney56131:you wanna fuck me ?? lolz Oct 09 9:26 PM Eric B.:god damn your annoying. Oct 09 9:26 PM robinolney56131:they give you a unique page, my link is http://caminvite.tumblr.com/Jenny Oct 09 9:26 PM Eric B.:BITCH PLEASE YOU GOT SMALL ASS TITES AND A FUCKED UP PUSSY Oct 09 9:26 PM robinolney56131:go there and my video will load, just click the "Accept Invite" button on the bottom left and it'll connect us..if your camera shy you dont have to show yourself, I'M the one with the fetish remember LOL Oct 09 9:27 PM Eric B.:no. Oct 09 9:27 PM robinolney56131:im always either on the phone or online, im a chat addict lol...i dont normally give my number out but if you meet me in the chat and I get comfortable with you we can talk on the phone Oct 09 9:27 PM Eric B.:no. Oct 09 9:27 PM robinolney56131:my number is 206-222-1648...my phone is dead, so give it a few minutes to charge, and please dont go give that out! hehe...come talk to me over on the chat site Oct 09 9:27 PM Eric B.:no. Oct 09 9:27 PM robinolney56131:its free, they ask for info for age verification...im sure i'll keep you entertained though Oct 09 9:28 PM Eric B.:i have a hand and ik how to use google, i dont need you to entertain me. Oct 09 9:28 PM robinolney56131:i love the site cause its streams fast in real-time sorta like a skype, fill out your info, its only for age verification k? Oct 09 9:28 PM Eric B.:uhm.. yeah sure do one thing for me pl0x? Oct 09 9:29 PM robinolney56131:i use this site to play on cause i don't want to be recorded, just watched!...this site doesn't allow people to record my cam just click the "Accept Invite" button on the left of the page and we'll be able to have a live chat Oct 09 9:29 PM Eric B.:theres a thing called fraps and hypercam Oct 09 9:29 PM Eric B.:so yeah.. Oct 09 9:29 PM robinolney56131:credit card is just to verify your age, it's free thru my cam session invite since I'm a premium member Oct 09 9:29 PM Eric B.:im 16. Oct 09 9:29 PM Eric B.:i dont own a credit card Oct 09 9:30 PM robinolney56131:yup, then once your logged in just go to the search on the top left and type Jen so you can find me, incase you get lost hehe..i'm gonna slip into something nice for you..k? Oct 09 9:30 PM Eric B.:no, not yup i dont own and fucking money and probbaly some horny ass 48 years old who lives in his moms basement. Oct 09 9:30 PM robinolney56131:miami Oct 09 9:30 PM Eric B.:what the fuck does that have to do with anything!? Oct 09 9:31 PM robinolney56131:I should be somewhere on the top row, you should see my pic Oct 09 9:31 PM Eric B.:im not going to the link. Oct 09 9:31 PM robinolney56131:Its http://caminvite.tumblr.com/Jenny just accept my cam invite Oct 09 9:31 PM Eric B.:yeah sure whats the square root of 5? Oct 09 9:31 PM robinolney56131:k Oct 09 9:31 PM Eric B.:how bigs your cock? Oct 09 9:31 PM robinolney56131:oh ya can i touch urs?? Oct 09 9:32 PM Eric B.:no, can i touch yours? Oct 09 9:32 PM robinolney56131:are u in babe?? Oct 09 9:32 PM Eric B.:bend over and spell run. Oct 09 9:32 PM robinolney56131:k Oct 09 9:32 PM Eric B.:did ya do it? Oct 09 9:33 PM Eric B.:oh.. no reply? Oct 09 9:33 PM Eric B.:you must be spellin. Oct 09 9:33 PM Eric B.:prob take u awhile Oct 09 9:33 PM Eric B.:its hard to spell huh? Oct 09 9:33 PM Eric B.:kthxbai. [/code]
Yeah... Post times youve had an encounter with a porn bot. xD

Sandra Damm says this is how i pay my bills and i don't fuck my customers but you are making me change my mind Patrick Dewey says You're email is tommymeaker, that's a guys name. + you're probably one of thosestupid porn bots Sandra Damm says don't break my heart Patrick Dewey says Lol Bitch i don't even know who the shit you are, i havent been on msn in forever Break your heart?
